title: About
text:
We are three first year students of the Research Master of Economics in Sciences Po, and this website aims to host our presentation for the Macroeconomics 2 Class.
Feel free to reach out to us via our academic mail “first_name.family_name@sciencespo.fr” :

GUGELMO CAVALHEIRO DIAS Paulo
MITASH Nayanika
WANG Shang

title: Paper review : “A Behavioral New Keynesian Model” of Xavier Gabaix, 2020
text:
Hello, we are Nayanika, Paulo and Shang, and this is the website of our Macroeconomics 2 presentation, dedicated to the review of the paper Gabaix, Xavier. 2020. “A Behavioral New Keynesian Model.” American Economic Review, 110 (8): 2271-2327.
Here are some useful resources :

The slides of our presentation (Here the LaTeX code)
An additional description of the equations of the paper (Here the LaTeX code)
The final version of the paper
A video presentation of a former version of the paper by Xavier Gabaix
The online appendix of the paper
